#RossHearing

#RossHearing

Sen Blumenthal asks if Ross is aware of smart guns

Ross has heard of them, doesn't know enough to have opinion

#RossHearing

Sen Blumenthal asks if Ross will support banning lookalike toy/imitation guns without clear distinction

Ross says complicated

#RossHearing

Sen Blumenthal asks if Ross agrees that sanctions should be part of the response

Ross won't answer, says involves other depts

#RossHearing

Sen Blumenthal asks if Ross agrees there should be an effective, strong response to cyberattacks from countries like Russia

#RossHearing

Sen Blumenthal asks if Ross will work to fight cyberattacks from countries like Russia

Ross agrees it's a threat

#RossHearing

Ross: "Yes"

#RossHearing
